intro: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Iron Hands Space Marine chapter oder any of its successor chapters. The Iron Hands are notable für their heavy use of bionics und their reverence für all things mechanical, und thus their close ties to the Adeptus Mechanicus.
strategy: Space Marine Armeen haben einen Strategiewert von 5.
Initiative: All Verbände haben eine Initiative von 1+.
armyRules: The They Shall Know No Fear special rule applies to all Iron Hands detachments und aircraft formations.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Iron Hands, oder eine of their successor chapters, using their preferred operational methods.

formations.name: Cybot Clan
formations.units: Ein Iron Hands Captain oder Techmarine, vier Taktischer Trupp plus transport, und any zwei of the following: Cybot, Hellfire Cybot, Siege Cybot

formations.name: Mechanisierte Clan
formations.units: Ein Iron Hands Captain oder Techmarine, vier Taktischer Trupp plus transport, und any zwei of the following: Predator Annihilator, Predator Destructor oder Vindicator

sections.name: Iron Hands Support Detachments
sections.description: Zwei Support Detachments may be taken pro Core Detachment

formations.name: Cybot Talon
formations.units: Any vier of the following: Cybot, Hellfire Cybot, Siege Cybot. Plus transport.

formations.name: Predators
formations.units: Vier Predator Destructors und/oder Predator Annihilators

formations.name: Siege Aufklärers
formations.units: Vier Aufklärers, zwei Siege Rhinos und zwei Vindicators

formations.name: Whirlwinds
extraUnits: Füge eine Whirlwind to the formation: 50 Punkte

sections.name: Iron Hands Navy & Collegia Titanica Allies
